title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1155.6 - Removal upon direction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1155.6 - Removal upon direction

State Regulations

Upon direction from the manager, the owner or operator of any
aircraft, watercraft or motor vehicle parked or stored at a terminal shall move
said aircraft, watercraft or motor vehicle from the place where it is parked or
stored to another designated place. If the owner or operator refuses to comply
with such directions, the authority may tow said aircraft, watercraft or motor
vehicle to such designated place at the owner's or operator's expense and
without liability for damage which may result in the course of such
removal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1155.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
